name: Call for communications and panels: IESE's 6th International Academic Conference
content: The Institute of Social and Economic Studies (IESE) is pleased to announce its 6th international academic conference, on the theme “Conflict, Violence and Development” that will be held in Maputo, Mozambique, from 15 to 16 September 2020\. Interested scholars are invited to submit their proposals for panels and/or communications, until April 30, 2020\. More info: http://www.iese.ac.mz/wp-content/uploads/2020/02/vi-conf-iese\_call-for-paper-english.pdf
organizers: Institute of Social and Economic Studies (IESE)
